Ignore `INDEX` changes in the bucket listener in `NotificationsDetailListFragment`.

Change local status of note only when we receive a `MODIFY` type from symposium in `NotificationsListFragment`.

Fixes #2000.

Synchronizing access to Note JSONObject instance

Protects from concurrency exceptions when reading and modifying the JSON values.

see #1982

Updating to Simperium 0.6.0

Includes Concurrency fixes.
Synchronizing on final object

Explicitly set Simperium version

Remove @aar, it was excluding the dependencies from being included.

Fixed a crash that could occur if `mNoteBlockArray` was modified in the background.

Adapter data shouldn't be modified in the background, so I removed the instance variable.
